verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַלְמ֥וּת לַבֵּ֗ן <WH4192> death מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> I will praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> [thee] O LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> with my whole heart אֲ֝סַפְּרָ֗ה <WH5608> I will shew forth כָּל־ <WH3605> of all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> all thy marvellous works
אֶשְׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8055> I will be glad וְאֶעֶלְצָ֣ה <WH5970> and rejoice בָ֑ךְ אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> in thee I will sing praise שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> to thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> O thou most High
בְּשׁוּב־ <WH7725> are turned אוֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> When mine enemies אָח֑וֹר <WH268> back יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ <WH3782> they shall fall וְ֝יֹאבְד֗וּ <WH6> and perish מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> at thy presence

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָ֭שִׂיתָ <WH6213> For thou hast maintained מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <WH4941> my right וְדִינִ֑י <WH1779> and my cause יָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <WH3427> thou satest לְ֝כִסֵּ֗א <WH3678> in the throne שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <WH8199> judging צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> right

גָּעַ֣רְתָּ <WH1605> Thou hast rebuked ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> the heathen אִבַּ֣דְתָּ <WH6> thou hast destroyed רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> the wicked שְׁמָ֥ם <WH8034> their name מָ֝חִ֗יתָ <WH4229> thou hast put out לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

הָֽאוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <WH341> O thou enemy תַּ֥מּוּ <WH8552> end חֳרָב֗וֹת <WH2723> destructions לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <WH5331> are come to a perpetual וְעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> the cities נָתַ֑שְׁתָּ <WH5428> and thou hast destroyed אָבַ֖ד <WH6> is perished זִכְרָ֣ם <WH2143> their memorial הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> with them
וַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> But the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever יֵשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> shall endure כּוֹנֵ֖ן <WH3559> he hath prepared לַמִּשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> for judgment כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> his throne

וְה֗וּא <WH1931> and He יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> And he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> in righteousness יָדִ֥ין <WH1777> he shall minister judgment לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> to the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> in uprightness

וִ֘יהִ֤י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH4869> also will be a refuge לַדָּ֑ךְ <WH1790> for the oppressed מִ֝שְׂגָּ֗ב <WH4869> a refuge לְעִתּ֥וֹת <WH6256> in times בַּצָּרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of trouble

וְיִבְטְח֣וּ <WH982> will put their trust בְ֭ךָ יוֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> And they that know שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> thy name כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not עָזַ֖בְתָּ <WH5800> hast not forsaken דֹרְשֶׁ֣יךָ <WH1875> them that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in thee for thou LORD

זַמְּר֗וּ <WH2167> Sing praises לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> to the LORD יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> which dwelleth צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> in Zion הַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> declare בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> among the people עֲלִֽילוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5949> his doings

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for דֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> When he maketh inquisition דָּ֭מִים <WH1818> for blood אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> זָכָ֑ר <WH2142> he remembereth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁ֝כַ֗ח <WH7911> them he forgetteth צַעֲקַ֥ת <WH6818> not the cry [עֲנִיִּים כ] (עֲנָוִֽים׃ <WH6041> afflicted ק)

חָֽנְנֵ֬נִי <WH2603> Have mercy יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> upon me O LORD רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> consider עָ֭נְיִי <WH6040> my trouble מִשֹּׂנְאָ֑י <WH8130> [which I suffer] of them that hate מְ֝רוֹמְמִ֗י <WH7311> me thou that liftest me up מִשַּׁ֥עֲרֵי <WH8179> from the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה <WH5608> That I may shew forth כָּֽל־ <WH3605> of all תְּהִלָּ֫תֶ֥יךָ <WH8416> all thy praise בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> in the gates בַת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion אָ֝גִ֗ילָה <WH1523> I will rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> in thy salvation

טָבְע֣וּ <WH2883> are sunk down ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> The heathen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> in the pit עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> [that] they made בְּרֶֽשֶׁת־ <WH7568> in the net ז֥וּ <WH2098> which טָ֝מָ֗נוּ <WH2934> they hid נִלְכְּדָ֥ה <WH3920> taken רַגְלָֽם׃ <WH7272> is their own foot

נ֤וֹדַ֨ע ׀ <WH3045> is known יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <WH4941> [by] the judgment עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <WH6213> [which] he executeth בְּפֹ֣עַל <WH6467> in the work כַּ֭פָּיו <WH3709> of his own hands נוֹקֵ֣שׁ <WH5367> is snared רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> the wicked הִגָּי֥וֹן <WH1902> Higgaion סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> shall be turned רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> The wicked לִשְׁא֑וֹלָה <WH7585> into hell כָּל־ <WH3605> all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> [and] all the nations שְׁכֵחֵ֥י <WH7913> that forget אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not לָ֭נֶצַח <WH5331> shall not alway יִשָּׁכַ֣ח <WH7911> be forgotten אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> For the needy תִּקְוַ֥ת <WH8615> the expectation [עֲנָוִים כ] (עֲ֝נִיִּ֗ים <WH6035> humble ק) תֹּאבַ֥ד <WH6> shall [not] perish לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> Arise יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God אַל־ <WH408> nay יָעֹ֣ז <WH5810> prevail אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH376> he יִשָּׁפְט֥וּ <WH8199> be judged ג֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> let the heathen עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> in thy sight

שִׁ֘יתָ֤ה <WH7896> Put יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3069> God מוֹרָ֗ה <WH4172> dread לָ֫הֶ֥ם <WH1992> like יֵדְע֥וּ <WH3045> may know גוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> [that] the nations אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH582> themselves [to be but] men הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
